publicationStmt.publisher: Sold by T. Garthwait, at the Little North-Door of St. Pauls Church,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "for him Mr Woodbridge" (written after 'Master Calamy'; "ffebr 12. 1660."; the second 1 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
